text: I would say my design style is very modern, very open. I definitely like open space. I have a lot of mismatching, unique pieces of furniture. And then certainly my lighting is a big component of my home. I just want to have a comfortable environment, but also an environment that doesn't feel cluttered. That's really important and key to me.
